code: import{SET_CURRENT_SCREEN,SET_APPLICATION_ERROR,SET_APPLICATION_LOADING}from'./actionTypes';export function setCurrentScreen(dispatch){return function(data){dispatch({type:SET_CURRENT_SCREEN,payload:data});};}export function setApplicationError(dispatch){return function(data){dispatch({type:SET_APPLICATION_ERROR,payload:data});};}export function setApplicationLoading(dispatch){return function(data){dispatch({type:SET_APPLICATION_LOADING,payload:data});};}
